gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Bucks 113, Bulls 97
gameRecap.excerpt: Led by Giannis Antetokounmpo's 46 points, 16 rebounds and 6 assists, the Bucks defeated the Bulls, 113-97. This was Antetokounmpo's 5th 45+ point game of the season and 20th of his career, while Damian Lillard added 16 points and seven assists in the victory. Coby White tallied 22 points for the Bulls in the losing effort. The Bucks win their fifth straight game as they improve to 40-21 on the season, while the Bulls fall to 28-32.
